verses.verse: And it came to pass <S%H1961><s%>, that when Isaac <S%H3327><s%> was old <S%H2204><s%>, and his eyes <S%H5869><s%> were dim <S%H3543><s%>, so that he could not see <S%H7200><s%>, he called <S%H7121><s%> Esau <S%H6215><s%> his oldest <S%H1419><s%> son <S%H1121><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H1121><s%>, My son: and he said unto him <S%H559><s%>, Behold, here am I.
And he said <S%H559><s%>, Behold now <S%H2204><s%>, I am old, I know <S%H3045><s%> not the day <S%H3117><s%> of my death <S%H4194><s%>:

Now therefore take <S%H5375><s%>, I pray you your weapons <S%H3627><s%>, your quiver <S%H8522><s%> and your bow <S%H7198><s%>, and go out <S%H3318><s%> to the field <S%H7704><s%>, and take <S%H6679><s%> me some venison <S%H6718><s%>;

And make <S%H6213><s%> me savory meat <S%H4303><s%>, such as <S%H834><s%> I love <S%H157><s%>, and bring <S%H935><s%> it to me <S%H398><s%>, that I may eat; that my soul <S%H5315><s%> may bless <S%H1288><s%> you before <S%H2962><s%> I die <S%H4191><s%>.

And Rebekah <S%H7259><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> when Isaac <S%H3327><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Esau <S%H6215><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>. And Esau <S%H6215><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> to the field <S%H7704><s%> to hunt <S%H6679><s%> for venison <S%H6718><s%>, and to bring it <S%H935><s%>.

And Rebekah <S%H7259><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> unto Jacob <S%H3290><s%> her son <S%H1121><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Behold <S%H8085><s%>, I heard your father <S%H1><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> unto Esau <S%H6215><s%> your brother <S%H251><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Bring <S%H935><s%> me venison <S%H6718><s%>, and make <S%H6213><s%> me savory meat <S%H4303><s%>, that I may eat <S%H398><s%>, and bless <S%H1288><s%> you before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> my death <S%H4194><s%>.
Now therefore <S%H1121><s%>, my son, obey <S%H8085><s%> my voice <S%H6963><s%> according to that which <S%H834><s%> I command you <S%H6680><s%>

Go <S%H3212><s%> now to the flock <S%H6629><s%>, and fetch <S%H3947><s%> me from there two <S%H8147><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> kids <S%H1423><s%> of the goats <S%H5795><s%>; and I will make <S%H6213><s%> them savory meat <S%H4303><s%> for your father <S%H1><s%>, such as he loves <S%H157><s%>:
And you shall bring <S%H935><s%> it to your father <S%H1><s%>, that he may eat <S%H398><s%>, and that <S%H834><s%> he may bless <S%H1288><s%> you before <S%H6440><s%> his death <S%H4194><s%>.

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Rebekah <S%H7259><s%> his mother <S%H517><s%>, Behold <S%H6215><s%>, Esau my brother <S%H251><s%> is a hairy <S%H8163><s%> man <S%H376><s%>, and I am a smooth <S%H2509><s%> man <S%H376><s%>:

My father <S%H1><s%> probably will feel <S%H4959><s%> me <S%H5869><s%>, and I shall seem to him as a deceiver <S%H8591><s%>; and I shall bring <S%H935><s%> a curse <S%H7045><s%> upon me <S%H1293><s%>, and not a blessing.

And his mother <S%H517><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H7045><s%>, Upon me be your curse, my son <S%H1121><s%>: only obey <S%H8085><s%> my voice <S%H6963><s%>, and go <S%H3212><s%> fetch me them <S%H3947><s%>.

And he went <S%H3212><s%>, and fetched <S%H3947><s%>, and brought <S%H935><s%> them to his mother <S%H517><s%>: and his mother <S%H517><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> savory meat <S%H4303><s%>, such as his father <S%H1><s%> loved <S%H157><s%>.

And Rebekah <S%H7259><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the good <S%H2532><s%> clothes <S%H899><s%> of her eldest <S%H1419><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> Esau <S%H6215><s%>, which were with her in the house <S%H1004><s%>, and put them upon <S%H3847><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> her younger <S%H6996><s%> son <S%H1121><s%>:
And she put <S%H3847><s%> the skins <S%H5785><s%> of the kids <S%H1423><s%> of the goats <S%H5795><s%> upon his hands <S%H3027><s%>, and upon the smooth <S%H2513><s%> of his neck <S%H6677><s%>:
And she gave <S%H5414><s%> the savory meat <S%H4303><s%> and the bread <S%H3899><s%>, which she had prepared <S%H6213><s%>, into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of her son <S%H1121><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%>.
And he came <S%H935><s%> unto his father <S%H1><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, My father <S%H1><s%>: and he said <S%H559><s%>, Here am I <S%H1121><s%>; who are you my son?

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto his father <S%H1><s%>, I am Esau <S%H6215><s%> your firstborn <S%H1060><s%>; I have done <S%H6213><s%> according as you told <S%H1696><s%> me <S%H6965><s%>: arise, I pray you sit <S%H3427><s%> and eat <S%H398><s%> of my venison <S%H6718><s%>, that your soul <S%H5315><s%> may bless me <S%H1288><s%>.

And Isaac <S%H3327><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto his son <S%H1121><s%>, How is it that you have found <S%H4672><s%> it so quickly <S%H4116><s%>, my son <S%H1121><s%>? And he said <S%H559><s%>, Because the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> brought <S%H7136><s%> it to me <S%H6440><s%>.

And Isaac <S%H3327><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, Come near <S%H5066><s%>, I pray you that I may feel <S%H4184><s%> you my son <S%H1121><s%>, whether you be my very <S%H2088><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> Esau or not <S%H6215><s%>.

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> went near <S%H5066><s%> unto Isaac <S%H3327><s%> his father <S%H1><s%>; and he felt <S%H4959><s%> him <S%H559><s%>, and said, The voice <S%H6963><s%> is Jacob <S%H3290><s%>'s voice <S%H6963><s%>, but the hands <S%H3027><s%> are the hands <S%H3027><s%> of Esau <S%H6215><s%>.

And he discerned <S%H5234><s%> him not <S%H3027><s%>, because his hands were hairy <S%H8163><s%>, as his brother <S%H251><s%> Esau <S%H6215><s%>'s hands <S%H3027><s%>: so he blessed him <S%H1288><s%>.
And he said <S%H559><s%>, are you my very son <S%H1121><s%> Esau <S%H6215><s%>? And he said <S%H559><s%>, I am.

And he said <S%H559><s%>, Bring it near <S%H5066><s%> to me <S%H398><s%>, and I will eat of my son <S%H1121><s%>'s venison <S%H6718><s%>, that my soul <S%H5315><s%> may bless <S%H1288><s%> you And he brought it near <S%H5066><s%> to him <S%H398><s%>, and he did eat: and he brought <S%H935><s%> him wine <S%H3196><s%>, and he drank <S%H8354><s%>.
And his father <S%H1><s%> Isaac <S%H3327><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H5066><s%>, Come near now <S%H5401><s%>, and kiss me <S%H1121><s%>, my son.

And he came near <S%H5066><s%>, and kissed <S%H5401><s%> him <S%H7306><s%>: and he smelled the smell <S%H7381><s%> of his clothes <S%H899><s%>, and blessed <S%H1288><s%> him <S%H559><s%>, and said, See <S%H7200><s%>, the smell <S%H7381><s%> of my son <S%H1121><s%> is as the smell <S%H7381><s%> of a field <S%H7704><s%> which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has blessed <S%H1288><s%>:

Therefore God <S%H430><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> you of the dew <S%H2919><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and the fatness <S%H4924><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, and plenty <S%H7230><s%> of corn <S%H1715><s%> and wine <S%H8492><s%>:

Let people <S%H5971><s%> serve <S%H5647><s%> you and nations <S%H3816><s%> bow down <S%H7812><s%> to you be <S%H1933><s%> lord <S%H1376><s%> over your brothers <S%H251><s%>, and let your mother <S%H517><s%>'s sons <S%H1121><s%> bow down <S%H7812><s%> to you cursed <S%H779><s%> be every one that curses <S%H779><s%> you and blessed <S%H1288><s%> be he that blesses you <S%H1288><s%>

And it came to pass <S%H3327><s%>, as soon as Isaac had made an end <S%H3615><s%> of blessing <S%H1288><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, and Jacob <S%H3290><s%> was yet <S%H389><s%> scarce <S%H3318><s%> gone out <S%H3318><s%> from the presence <S%H6440><s%> of Isaac <S%H3327><s%> his father <S%H1><s%>, that Esau <S%H6215><s%> his brother <S%H251><s%> came in <S%H935><s%> from his hunting <S%H6718><s%>.

And he also had made <S%H6213><s%> savory meat <S%H4303><s%>, and brought it <S%H935><s%> unto his father <S%H1><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto his father <S%H1><s%>, Let my father <S%H1><s%> arise <S%H6965><s%>, and eat <S%H398><s%> of his son <S%H1121><s%>'s venison <S%H6718><s%>, that your soul <S%H5315><s%> may bless me <S%H1288><s%>.
And Isaac <S%H3327><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H559><s%>, Who are you And he said, I am your son <S%H1121><s%>, your firstborn <S%H1060><s%> Esau <S%H6215><s%>.

And Isaac <S%H3327><s%> trembled <S%H2729><s%> very <S%H1419><s%> violently <S%H3966><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, Who <S%H645><s%>? Where is he that has taken <S%H6679><s%> venison <S%H6718><s%>, and brought <S%H935><s%> it me <S%H398><s%>, and I have eaten of all before you came <S%H935><s%>, and have blessed <S%H1288><s%> him <S%H1288><s%>? Yes and he shall be blessed.

And when Esau <S%H6215><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of his father <S%H1><s%>, he cried <S%H6817><s%> with a great <S%H1419><s%> and exceedingly <S%H3966><s%> bitter <S%H4751><s%> cry <S%H6818><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto his father <S%H1><s%>, Bless <S%H1288><s%> me <S%H1><s%>, even me also, O my father.
And he said <S%H559><s%>, your brother <S%H251><s%> came <S%H935><s%> with deceit <S%H4820><s%>, and has taken away <S%H3947><s%> your blessing <S%H1293><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%>, Is not he rightly <S%H3588><s%> named <S%H7121><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%>? for he has supplanted me <S%H6117><s%> these <S%H2088><s%> two times <S%H6471><s%>: he took away <S%H3947><s%> my birthright <S%H1062><s%>; and <S%H3947><s%>, behold, now he has taken away my blessing <S%H1293><s%>. And he said <S%H559><s%>, have you not reserved <S%H680><s%> a blessing for me <S%H1293><s%>?

And Isaac <S%H3327><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto Esau <S%H6215><s%>, Behold <S%H7760><s%>, I have made him your lord <S%H1376><s%>, and all his brothers <S%H251><s%> have I given <S%H5414><s%> to him for servants <S%H5650><s%>; and with corn <S%H1715><s%> and wine <S%H8492><s%> have I sustained <S%H5564><s%> him <S%H6213><s%>: and what shall I do now <S%H645><s%> unto you my son <S%H1121><s%>?

And Esau <S%H6215><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto his father <S%H1><s%>, have you but one <S%H259><s%> blessing <S%H1293><s%>, my father <S%H1><s%>? bless <S%H1288><s%> me <S%H1><s%>, even me also, O my father. And Esau <S%H6215><s%> lifted up <S%H5375><s%> his voice <S%H6963><s%>, and wept <S%H1058><s%>.

And Isaac <S%H3327><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H4186><s%>, Behold, your living shall be the fatness <S%H4924><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, and of the dew <S%H2919><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> from above <S%H5920><s%>;

And by your sword <S%H2719><s%> shall you live <S%H2421><s%>, and shall serve <S%H5647><s%> your brother <S%H251><s%>; and it shall come to pass when you shall have the dominion <S%H7300><s%>, that you shall break <S%H6561><s%> his yoke <S%H5923><s%> from off your neck <S%H6677><s%>.

And Esau <S%H6215><s%> hated <S%H7852><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> because <S%H5921><s%> of the blessing <S%H1293><s%> with which <S%H834><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> blessed him <S%H1288><s%>: and Esau <S%H6215><s%> said <S%H559><s%> in his heart <S%H3820><s%>, The days <S%H3117><s%> of mourning <S%H60><s%> for my father <S%H1><s%> are at hand <S%H7126><s%>; then will I kill <S%H2026><s%> my brother <S%H251><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%>.

And these words <S%H1697><s%> of Esau <S%H6215><s%> her elder <S%H1419><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> were told <S%H5046><s%> to Rebekah <S%H7259><s%>: and she sent <S%H7971><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> her younger <S%H6996><s%> son <S%H1121><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H251><s%>, Behold, your brother Esau <S%H6215><s%>, as touching you does comfort <S%H5162><s%> himself <S%H2026><s%>, purposing to kill you
Now therefore <S%H1121><s%>, my son, obey <S%H8085><s%> my voice <S%H6963><s%>; and arise <S%H6965><s%>, flee <S%H1272><s%> you to Laban <S%H3837><s%> my brother <S%H251><s%> to Haran <S%H2771><s%>;
And stay <S%H3427><s%> with him a few <S%H259><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>, until <S%H834><s%> your brother <S%H251><s%>'s fury <S%H2534><s%> turn away <S%H7725><s%>;

Until your brother <S%H251><s%>'s anger <S%H639><s%> turn away <S%H7725><s%> from you and he forget <S%H7911><s%> that which you have done <S%H6213><s%> to him <S%H7971><s%>: then I will send, and fetch <S%H3947><s%> you from there why <S%H4100><s%> should I be deprived <S%H7921><s%> also of you both <S%H8147><s%> in one <S%H259><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>?

And Rebekah <S%H7259><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Isaac <S%H3327><s%>, I am weary <S%H6973><s%> of my life <S%H2416><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Heth <S%H2845><s%>: if Jacob <S%H3290><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> of the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Heth <S%H2845><s%>, such as these which are of the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>, what good <S%H4100><s%> shall my life do me <S%H2416><s%>?
